body.name: Dash Cam Mount Compatible with APEMAN Dashcam, Suction Mount Easy to Install and Use, Replacement Screen Mount Strong Suction Power Hight Durability and Removeable 2 Pcs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 7 mins
features: ✈✈ Strong Suction Power. Experiment shows this windshield mount can hang up 9 POUNDS of cola, dashcam usually weights about 0.6 pound, this suction cup mount can hold it tightly even in a bouncy work truck
✈✈ Easy To Install And Use. Simple structure and friendly design make it easy to install and use. 3 steps to install, and rotatable design make adjust Dash Cam to get a good shooting view easily

✈✈ Easy To Remove And Hight Durability. just 2 simple steps to take the mount off from windshield with the ingenious design. The suction mount is made of high quality material which make it be able to work for a long time
✈✈ Two different sizes of joints,as shown in the figure. Compatible With The Following Dash Cam, APEMAN C450, C420, C860, C420D

✈✈ Considerate Service. Any problem just get a new one or MONEY BACK. We provide 2 dash cam sucker holders which doesn’t mean they are not good, they are good quality, we just provide you more benefits

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good replacement mount
reviews.reviewText: The mount for my Dash cam broke, so I was looking for a replacement and came across this. This fits into my cam perfectly and seems much sturdier and secure than the original mount. It is a bit bigger than my previous mount, so I did have to move the placement a bit so it's not a distraction, but that's no big deal. Overall, it's a great replacement mount and highly recommend for the Apeman c450 dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glucrean Dash Cam suction mount for older HD dash cam. (2 Pcs)
reviews.reviewText: - Purchased this dash cam suction mount based on the vendor images that show this mount can be used to replace other dash cam suction mount bases by using the old mount parts on it. See review images for reference. The new suction mount works great with the old round part that has the screw-on part that my old dash-cam uses. Just take the new part that comes with the new suction mounts out and replace it with the one from your dash cam uses if it fits. An additional note, the measurements or dimensions provided on the product page images are accurate, which the round part that inserts into the mount base measures 16mm across.- One of my dash cams that I have for many years that works great, the suction base had become brittle in the sun from many years of use. So when it was time to replace the mount it was nice to find these suction mounts here on Amazon that can be used by replacing the round threaded part that screws into the dash cam.- The materials of these mounts are well made, the suction part feels tight against the car windshield when installed, and the dash camera has less play when tightened up or snug, when compared to my old dash cam mounts, which I still have one in use to compare it to. Overall, these mounts have been in use for at least two months from the date of this review, and they work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Very tight fit for ape man dashcam replacement. Good suction mount, but doesn't fit camera 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and use
reviews.reviewText: My original suction cup for my dash cam fell so many times it broke apart. This one fits my camera perfectly and was really easy to install. The package was also easy to open.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice big suction cups , however Not holding up in NC winter
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to replace our existing dashcam suction cups which are more than 5 yrs old.These were easy to install and adjust for our Aukey Dashcam.However as weather is getting cold these are not holding on the glass anymore.Both cars are parked in insulated garage at night where avg temp is 55F in NC.I like them and want them to work for me , still not giving up hope.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work great so far - better than original mount!
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to replace two mounts on our apeman cameras after a windshield replacement. These definitely grab harder than the original ones the cameras came with which always fell off when it was hot or sitting in the sun. Would recommend and they also come with a pop socket

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didnt fit my application like the ad or direcctions
reviews.reviewText: Pure junk even the directions said if it didn't work throw it away and email them directly lol don't be fooled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement mount at great price.
reviews.reviewText: When I got the Mount, I was a little worried because it didn’t look like it was going to fit. The hook didn’t slides into the slot perfectly and it seemed a little loose once it’s in. After playing around with it for a few minutes, I decided the lift/bend the tab up just a little bit and it slid in easily. Once it was able to go in, it fit snuggly. The rest of the mount worked perfectly. With two in the box, this was by far the best option.
Perfect for the job. As advertised.

Being on a ball joint it’s easy to adjust/aim. Only problem I have is that the piece that connects to dashcams is a little too thick. You really have to force it in there. I tried it on 2 different cams purchased here on Amazon with the same issue. Other than that it’s good.
